PSCT.Base: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Yubel" monster from your Deck. During your opponent's turn, when a monster effect is activated, while you control a "Yubel" monster (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; the activated effect becomes "Destroy 1 "Yubel" monster on the field". During your End Phase, if you control "Yubel" and this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand, or Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Samsara D Lotus" once per turn.
